description:
YOU ARE ABOUT TO MASTER THE SOFTWARE TESTING
**********************************************************************************************************
Gain 7+ Years Testing experience level by just following through this course

"No more Boring Definitions. Understand how things work Practically"
**********************************************************************************************************This Course is Uniquely designed for the people who want to learn software Testing and implementing it in real time projects by following industry standards.

This course covers

What is Software Testing
Software Testing Stages
QA Role in different stages of Testing
Writing Effective TestCases
Following Standard Testcases Template
How to test an application in different ways
Doing out of box testing and validating Negative Scenarios
Defect Life cycle Management
Defect stages and QA role in each stage
Practical explanation on Smoke Testing, Sanity Testing
Difference between functional and non functional requirements
Discussion of 20 different types of Testing commonly used
Explanation on Waterfall iterative and Agile Models
What is Automation and scope of it
DIfferent Testing tools available and discussion on them

From ground till sky level this course covers every concept in Testing which is a need of current automation industry.
title: QA Expert :Software Testing + Bugzilla + SQL + Agile+ Unix
